entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
